name: Blanche
desc: A shopkeeper who owns Mondstadt General Goods. She sells cooking ingredients that are often used in Mondstadt dishes.

customize.text: Adventure Challenge: A Legend of Ice and Fire

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
An Ice Shieldwall Mitachurl comes marching down from Dragonspine's heights, and from the forest emerges two Blazing Axe Mitachurls. The Mitachurl from Dragonspine would like to trade its shield for one of those flaming axes...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: When the battle begins, all your characters will gain 2 Energy.</color>
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: Energy is abundant in this battle. Use Elemental Bursts to achieve victory!</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
